config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration _journalDiskSync is used in the code to determine whether to enable disk synchronization for the journal. If _transientMode is false, a PersistentJournal is created with the specified _journalDiskSync value.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the _journalDiskSync configuration depends on the frequency of journal writes and the size of the journal. If journal writes are frequent or the journal size exceeds the threshold, disk synchronization will be triggered accordingly.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the _journalDiskSync configuration on the system is related to data durability and performance. Enabling disk synchronization can ensure data integrity by flushing data to disk, but it may also introduce performance overhead due to disk write operations.
